Algorithm: For each idle/low-load agent, find highest priority unassigned task with no file conflicts, no blocking dependencies, consider agent's current queue load. Preview assignments before applying (show agent → task mappings). User can review and confirm or cancel. On confirm: batch assign all tasks via bd CLI. Use Svelte reactivity to show instant UI updates. Acceptance: Auto-assign works, avoids conflicts, shows preview, assigns optimally.

Use Svelte  for reactive calculations. Acceptance: Visual capacity bars, color-coded, accurate estimates, responsive updates.
